recovery.instructions1: The authentication using security devices for your {{username}} account has failed.
recovery.instructions2: To access your account, use the following activation code from another mobile device or computer. You can also provide it to the system owner to restore your access.

registration.instructions1: The user account {{username}} is available. Click on the Register button to claim it.

applicationList.title: MilleGrilles Applications
applicationList.activateACodeDescription: Activate another device on this account using an activation code (e.g. abcd-1234) or QR code.
applicationList.addSecurityDeviceDescription: Add a new security device to access your account. This can be a USB security token, Apple/Android device, etc.

activateCode.title: Activate a code
activateCode.validCode: The code is valid. Click on Next to activate it.
activateCode.invalidCode: The code does not correspond to your account.
activateCode.uploadKeyInstructions: Use the following button if you have received a key in a .json file to upload.
activateCode.validKey: The key is valid. Click on renew this browser's certificate and follow the instructions.
